name: saki-grid-multisearch-5
creator: Jozef Sakalos, Saki
summary: Adds row of editable fields above the grid view for easy searching/filtering.
detailedDescription: Grid MultiSearch plugin solves the problem of filtering or searching in large databases visualized by Ext grid. User can type filtering data in a row of editable fields that plugin adds above the grid view. User-typed values become filtering data.
